text: Virginie Ujlaky (born February 13, 1984 in Neuilly-sur-Seine) is a Hungarian fencer. She has a dual citizenship of France and Hungary. She won the Junior World Fencing Championships for France in 2004. She was team European champion with Hungary in 2007. She also represented Hungary at the 2008 Summer Olympics in the women's team foil event, where they finished fourth. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian female fencers Category:French female fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Hungary Category:Fencers at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Neuilly-sur-Seine
title: Virginie Ujlaky
